# ===============================================
# Access Rights for Complete Model Example
# ===============================================
#
# Format: id,name,model_id:id,group_id:id,perm_read,perm_write,perm_create,perm_unlink
#
# Permission Levels:
# - perm_read (1): Can view records
# - perm_write (1): Can edit records
# - perm_create (1): Can create records
# - perm_unlink (1): Can delete records
#
# ===============================================

# ---------------------------------------------
# MAIN MODEL: complete.model.example
# ---------------------------------------------

# PUBLIC ACCESS (no group_id) - Read only for portal/public users
access_complete_model_example_public,Complete Model Public Access,model_complete_model_example,,1,0,0,0

# USER ACCESS - Read and create for regular users
access_complete_model_example_user,Complete Model User Access,model_complete_model_example,base.group_user,1,1,1,0

# MANAGER ACCESS - Full access for managers
access_complete_model_example_manager,Complete Model Manager Access,model_complete_model_example,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# PORTAL ACCESS - Read own projects
access_complete_model_example_portal,Complete Model Portal Access,model_complete_model_example,base.group_portal,1,0,0,0

# ---------------------------------------------
# RELATED MODEL: complete.model.task
# ---------------------------------------------

# Public - No access
access_complete_model_task_public,Complete Model Task Public,model_complete_model_task,,0,0,0,0

# User - Full access (will be limited by record rules)
access_complete_model_task_user,Complete Model Task User,model_complete_model_task,base.group_user,1,1,1,1

# Manager - Full access
access_complete_model_task_manager,Complete Model Task Manager,model_complete_model_task,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# Portal - Read own tasks
access_complete_model_task_portal,Complete Model Task Portal,model_complete_model_task,base.group_portal,1,0,0,0

# ---------------------------------------------
# RELATED MODEL: complete.model.timesheet
# ---------------------------------------------

# User - Full access to own timesheets
access_complete_model_timesheet_user,Complete Model Timesheet User,model_complete_model_timesheet,base.group_user,1,1,1,1

# Manager - Full access
access_complete_model_timesheet_manager,Complete Model Timesheet Manager,model_complete_model_timesheet,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# ---------------------------------------------
# CONFIGURATION: complete.model.tag
# ---------------------------------------------

# User - Read all, no modifications
access_complete_model_tag_user,Complete Model Tag User,model_complete_model_tag,base.group_user,1,0,0,0

# Manager - Full access
access_complete_model_tag_manager,Complete Model Tag Manager,model_complete_model_tag,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# ---------------------------------------------
# CONFIGURATION: complete.model.stage
# ---------------------------------------------

# User - Read all
access_complete_model_stage_user,Complete Model Stage User,model_complete_model_stage,base.group_user,1,0,0,0

# Manager - Full access
access_complete_model_stage_manager,Complete Model Stage Manager,model_complete_model_stage,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# ---------------------------------------------
# TRANSIENT MODELS (Wizards)
# ---------------------------------------------

# Mass Update Wizard - User access
access_project_mass_update_wizard,Project Mass Update Wizard,model_project_mass_update_wizard,base.group_user,1,1,1,1

# Report Wizard - User access
access_project_report_wizard,Project Report Wizard,model_project_report_wizard,base.group_user,1,1,1,1

# Import Wizard - Manager only
access_project_import_wizard,Project Import Wizard,model_project_import_wizard,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# Batch Action Wizard - Manager only
access_project_batch_action_wizard,Project Batch Action Wizard,model_project_batch_action_wizard,base.group_system,1,1,1,1

# ---------------------------------------------
# CUSTOM SECURITY GROUPS (if defined)
# ---------------------------------------------

# Project User (custom group)
# access_complete_model_example_project_user,Complete Model Project User,model_complete_model_example,module.group_project_user,1,1,1,0

# Project Manager (custom group)
# access_complete_model_example_project_manager,Complete Model Project Manager,model_complete_model_example,module.group_project_manager,1,1,1,1

# ---------------------------------------------
# NOTES:
# ---------------------------------------------
# 1. Always define public access first (no group)
# 2. Then base.group_portal for portal users
# 3. Then base.group_user for internal users
# 4. Finally base.group_system for administrators
#
# 5. Use record rules (ir.rule) to limit which records users can access
#    Access rights control MODEL access
#    Record rules control RECORD access
#
# 6. For transient models (wizards), usually give full access since
#    they only exist temporarily in memory
#
# 7. Common Odoo groups:
#    - base.group_portal: Portal users (customers)
#    - base.group_user: Internal users
#    - base.group_system: Settings/Administrator
#    - base.group_multi_company: Multi-company users
#    - base.group_public: Public website visitors
#
# 8. Multi-company:
#    Access rights are global
#    Use record rules with company_ids for multi-company filtering
#
# ===============================================
